channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- Sametime
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- Sametime

item.title: CVE-2024-30122|2024-10-23T14:59:04.223Z -- hcl%20software -- sametime
item.description: HCL Sametime is impacted by misconfigured security related HTTP headers. It was identified that some HTTP headers were missing on web service responses. This will lead to less secure browser default treatment for the policies controlled by these headers.
